data.name: DEATHLOOP Original Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Immerse yourself in the world of DEATHLOOP with the complete original game soundtrack, including the tracks “Déjà Vu,” “Pitch Black” and “Down the Rabbit Hole.” Experience 59 amazing songs with a total run time of over 2 hours. The soundtrack includes both MP3s and high-resolution WAV audio files.
data.about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the world of DEATHLOOP with the complete original game soundtrack, including the tracks “Déjà Vu,” “Pitch Black” and “Down the Rabbit Hole.” Experience 59 amazing songs with a total run time of over 2 hours. The soundtrack includes both MP3s and high-resolution WAV audio files.
data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of DEATHLOOP with the complete original game soundtrack. Experience 59 amazing songs with a total run time of over 2 hours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: DEATHLOOP will contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content, and strong language.
